extension.description: Writes the selected text in the editor to a Notion page. You can configure to write to a daily page by date or to a fixed page.
command.write.title: Write selected text to Notion (Markdown enabled)
command.writeText.title: Write selected text to Notion as plain text
command.writeCodeBlock.title: Write selected text to Notion as a code block
configuration.databasePageUrl.descriptio:
URL of the database page. Text will be written to a page for each date.

※Required if the text destination is "Database Page".
configuration.fixedPageUrl.description:
URL of the fixed page. Text is always written to the same page.

※Required if the text destination is "Fixed Page".
configuration.dateColumnName.description:
Name of the date column. Specify the name of the date column in the database page.

※If omitted, the default column name for the language will be used.
configuration.dateFormat.description:
Date format for the page title.

※Format reference: <https://date-fns.org/v4.1.0/docs/format>
configuration.writeTimestamp.description: Include a timestamp with the text.
